title: Latest News from Science Magazine
description: Keyword search result for Alerts: News Weekly Headlines -- New results matching your keyword search query (updated daily).

items.title: High-resolution climate model forecasts a wet, turbulent future
items.description: With details as fine as short-term weather forecasts, model achieves newfound accuracy

items.title: AI spots ‘ghost’ signatures of ancient life on Earth
items.description: Find could revolutionize search for early life on our planet and elsewhere in the cosmos

items.title: Giant telescope project, long planned for Hawaii, gets cozy with Spain
items.description: Spain’s €400 million offer could induce Thirty Meter Telescope to switch sites

items.title: Have wild wolves learned to use tools?
items.description: Video captures a lone female pulling crab traps out of the water, but does it count as tool use?

items.title: This parasitic ant tricks workers into killing their own queen
items.description: Scientists capture a unique—and gruesome—example of matricide in the animal kingdom

items.title: Republican push to make U.S. census surveys voluntary alarms statisticians
items.description: Pending bills targeting decennial census and American Community Survey would make results less reliable

items.title: Is NIH cutting corners as it rushes to fill leadership positions?
items.description: Unlike in the past, agency searches appear to exclude help from outside academic researchers

items.title: Mammoth mummies up to 50,000 years old yield oldest RNA yet found
items.description: Ancient RNA promises to shed light on how genes functioned in extinct animals

items.title: Deal to end U.S. shutdown includes good news for farm science funding
items.description: Lawmakers reject Trump’s request for deep cuts to research programs

items.title: The Trump administration is dismantling efforts to fight the next pandemic
items.description: A retreat from investments in drugs and vaccines leaves U.S. less prepared for the next viral scourge, experts warn
